content: materials - 7 skeins of purl soho s alpaca pure 1 100% super baby alpaca each skein is 109 yards approximately 763 yards required we used the color heirloom white - a size j 6 mm afghan crochet hook 3 gauge 14 stitches = 4 inches in tunisian crochet gobelin stitch size 12 inches wide x 70 inches long 1 https //www purlsoho com/alpaca-pure 2 https //www purlsoho com/yarn/knitting-crochet html yarn_stitches_per_inch_filter=971 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools/crochet-hooks html
